content: The graduate advisor for software engineering is Jorge Camarillo, contact: phone: 520-621-0575, email: jorgecamarillo@arizona.edu, office location: ECE 266, schedule appointment here: https://ua-trellis.my.site.com/uastudent/s/catcloud/services/calendar/?NetId=jorgecamarillo
